headline: How Motorola Solutions (MSI) Balances Innovation With Shareholder Returns
summary: Motorola Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:MSI) is included among the 11 Best Telecom Dividend Stocks to Buy for 2025. Motorola Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:MSI) provides hardware, software, and cloud-based systems that support critical safety and communications for public safety agencies and enterprise organizations.
